case_title: UMAR HAYAT vs MUHAMMAD NAWAZ KHAN Etc

petitioner.claim: Petitioner's area included in joint Khata without consent.
petitioner.prayer: Case to be remanded to Collector for decision on merit.

respondent.claim: Four mutations attested on the same day with thumb impressions. Appeal time-barred by 3 months and 5 days.

key_points: Appeal time-barred by 3 months and 5 days.
Petitioner advised to approach Civil Courts for fraud claims.
decision.final_ruling: Impugned orders of Additional Commissioner upheld.
